solution_line_template: Lucy had ${initial_balance} + ${deposit_amount} = $<<{initial_balance}+{deposit_amount}={balance_after_deposit}>>{balance_after_deposit} after making a deposit.
So, her bank balance is ${balance_after_deposit} - ${withdrawal_amount} = $<<{balance_after_deposit}-{withdrawal_amount}={final_balance}>>{final_balance} after making a withdrawal.
